title: @Riot I'm currently sitting at 999 wins.  Anybody want to join me for win 1000?
body: I don't know what to say.  I've been playing for 3 years and am about to hit quadruple digits in wins.  Anybody at Riot want to join me in this milestone?

replies.body: Hiya! I'm around later today, if you'd like to play. Does 2PM PST work for you?

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=KzOLbAmE,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-01T16:47:35.070+0000)
>
> Hiya! I'm around later today, if you'd like to play. Does 2PM PST work for you?

I'll try to make that work.  Thanks!
Looks like I missed you by a few minutes. D: Meeting ran late!
